_docs: Each gig object: id (unique slug), date (YYYY-MM-DD), venue, city, country, title (optional headline), description, photos (array of filenames without extension), coverPhoto (filename without ext), youtubeUrls (array), credits (object of role: name). Photos live in assets/gigs/<id>/{thumbs,1200,2000}/<filename>.webp

gigs.title: New Year Jazz Session
gigs.description: An intimate evening of original compositions blending jazz fusion with electronic textures. The Jazz Club's legendary acoustics made this one of our most memorable performances. Three sets spanning our entire catalog, plus a few surprises.

gigs.title: Rock Fest 2025
gigs.description: Our biggest stage yet. 5,000 people under the open sky at Krakow's annual Rock Fest. We headlined the second day with a 90-minute set that closed with a 15-minute jam session. The energy from the crowd was absolutely electric.

gigs.title: Berlin Underground Night
gigs.description: A raw, stripped-down set in one of Berlin's most iconic underground venues. No frills, just the music echoing off concrete walls. We debuted three new tracks that night and the crowd response told us we were onto something special.
